options.name: name

options.label: WEB项目路径

options.label: 源码库URL

options.validate: [{"type":"length","rule":{"max":100,"maxm":"源码库URL长度不能大于100个字符"}},{"type":"required","rule":{"m":"源码库URL不能为空"}}]

options.label: 用户名
options.name: username
options.validate: [{"type":"length","rule":{"max":32,"maxm":"用户名长度不能大于32个字符"}},{"type":"required","rule":{"m":"用户名不能为空"}}]

options.label: 密码
options.name: password

options.name: ignorePath
